abstract: Employees at many financial firms are being asked to work from home on Monday as Hurricane Sandy bears down on the East Coast, with Citigroup, Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan Chase planning to close their offices in Manhattan.
snippet: Employees at many financial firms are being asked to work from home on Monday as Hurricane Sandy bears down on the East Coast, with Citigroup, Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan Chase planning to close their offices in Manhattan.

headline.main: Wall Street Prepares to Work From Home as Storm Approaches

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
